translation: The Blessed Lord said, "I will again declare to thee that supreme knowledge, the best of all knowledge, having known which all the sages have gone to supreme perfection after this life."
commentary: 14.1 The supreme? Bhuyah again? I will declare (I) will declare? of all knowledge? Knowledge knowledge? The best the best? that which? knowing having known? The sages the sages? All all? The supreme supreme? Siddhim to perfection? From here after this life?
